AI Decision: NASA‚Äôs upcoming Pandora small satellite mission will characterize exoplanet atmospheres and their host stars, providing improved atmospheric context that can support future habitability and biosignature assessments but is not directly focused on origins-of-life mechanisms.

Abstract: A new NASA spacecraft called Pandora is awaiting launch ahead of its journey to study the atmospheres of exoplanets, or worlds beyond our solar system, and their stars. All three missions are set to launch Jan. 11 on a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket from Space Launch Complex 4 East at Vandenberg Space Force Base in [‚Ä¶] The post Launch Of Pandora Satellite And CubeSats To Explore Exoplanets appeared first on Astrobiology .

AI Decision: French news report on striking private doctors marching in Paris over healthcare policy and professional autonomy, with no connection to origins-of-life or astrobiology research.

Abstract: Plusieurs milliers de m√©decins lib√©raux en gr√®ve depuis lundi d√©filent samedi √† Paris contre une "d√©rive autoritaire" qui menace selon eux leur "libert√© d'exercice", appelant le Premier ministre S√©bastien Lecornu √† leur "faire des propositions". "Maltraiter les soignants, c'est maltraiter les patients", proclame la banderole de t√™te port√©e par les syndicats repr√©sentatifs des professionnels. Parmi les slogans des manifestants, venus nombreux en blouse blanche, "on veut des soignants pas des sanctions", "la S√©cu parle chiffres, nous parlons patients" ou encore, √† l'intention du gouvernement, "nous ne sommes pas des pions de vos √©checs".
